title: Assemble a Listing Presentation
description: An agent is meeting a potential seller and needs to prepare a listing presentation to win their business.

tasks.description: Prepare a Comparative Market Analysis (CMA) for the seller's property.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed CMA report is generated.

tasks.description: Prepare a marketing plan outlining how the property will be advertised (e.g., online, social media, print).
tasks.expected_outcome: A customized marketing plan is created for the specific property.

tasks.description: Combine the CMA, marketing plan, and agent's resume into a single presentation deck.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional slide deck is assembled, ready for the client meeting.
